Repack Features

  • Based on The.Legend.of.Heroes.Trails.of.Cold.Steel-CODEX ISO release: codex-the.legend.of.heroes.trails.of.cold.steel.iso (9,881,878,528 bytes)
  • The.Legend.of.Heroes.Trails.of.Cold.Steel.DLC.Unlocker-CODEX applied, all 18 DLCs activated
  • Alternative Japanese voiceovers from PS3 release added (9450 files, 2.3 GB), thanks to Falcom Discord for those. Note: Japanese dub have less files than English, you’ll hear silence in ~30% of phrases
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with lossless English audio)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of lossless or lossy audiofiles for both Japanese/English languages and Japanese optional videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.5 to 1.8~5.3 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 5-15 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 16 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Taking place on the same continent as the fan favorite Trails in the Sky offshoot of Nihon Falcom’s storied The Legend of Heroes franchise, Trails of Cold Steel (Sen no Kiseki in Japanese) is the first in the series to tread Erebonian soil and explore the inner political conflicts of this oft-mentioned powerhouse nation in detail. Delve into the expansive lore that has become synonymous with the series, enjoy school life and bond with fellow students to earn new abilities in battle, take advantage of speedy, tactical turn-based combat with the newly-developed “ARCUS” system, and uncover dramatic events that stand to change everything these two opposing social classes stand for.

Like a guest from early 2000’s, this game uses uncompressed WAV files for audio, and they take 6.4 GB of disk space. If you think that it’s an overkill, you can download and install lossy audio files. I encoded them with state-of-the-art Opus audio codec, with variable bitrate from 64 Kbps (mono) to 128 Kbps (stereo). The same encoder I used in my Black Ops 3 repack and ~90% of users couldn’t distinguish original audio from Opus-encoded. But of course, decision is yours.

You can skip downloading of voice and videos files you don’t need and multiplayer files you can’t use anyway. Here is the list of selective/optional files.

  • setup-fitgirl-optional-japanese-videos.bin (videos for Japanese game version)
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-lossless.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-lossless-english.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-lossless-japanese.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-lossy.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-lossy-english.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-lossy-japanese.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with lossless Japanese voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download setup-fitgirl-selective-lossless.bin, setup-fitgirl-selective-lossless-japanese.bin & all main files (01-04).
